model

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Unit
      • model.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntity, IUnit, IPawn, ISquare
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dead, Door, Enemy, Key, Loot, Player, Spell

    public abstract class Entity
extends Unit
implements IEntity

    The Entity class.

    An unit which is capable of moving, or performing interactions with other units.
    Author:
    Ryo SHIINA

    • Method Detail

      • getDurability

        public int getDurability()
        Description copied from interface: IEntity
        Returns the durability of the entity. If this equals 0, the entity can be destroyed instantly. If this returns a value higher than 0, then it will require a proportional time (counted in frames) before getting destroyed.
        Specified by:
        getDurability in interface IEntity
        Returns:

      • decrementDurability

        public void decrementDurability()
        Description copied from interface: IEntity
        Decrements the durability of the entity. If its value is already 0, the operation won't happen.
        Specified by:
        decrementDurability in interface IEntity
